title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Exploring Similar Triangle Concepts Using Dynamic Geometry Software

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geometric concepts (types of triangles, angles, ratios, etc.) and elementary-level mathematical computation skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the definition, properties, and identification criteria of similar triangles using DGS (Dynamic Geometry Software).
Learners can mathematically prove the proportional relationships of corresponding sides and angles in similar triangles through geometric transformation experiments in DGS.
Learners can apply the concept of similar triangles to solve real-world problems (e.g., map scales, architectural design) and present the problem-solving process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
